body: We need to check in the `replay.client` command that the flow(s) we're about to replay are not live yet.

issue.title: [Snyk] Fix for 1 vulnerabilities

issue.body:
Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

[SNYK-JS-NODESASS-542662](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-NODESASS-542662) | No

Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

![merge advice](https://app.snyk.io/badges/merge-advice/?package_manager=npm&package_name=node-sass&from_version=4.7.2&to_version=4.14.1&pr_id=bf504041-2dc6-480a-b085-4a93faa6b52f&visibility=true&has_feature_flag=false) #### Changes included in this PR - Changes to the following files to upgrade the vulnerable dependencies to a fixed version: - docs/package.json #### Vulnerabilities that will be fixed ##### With an upgrade: Severity | Priority Score (*) | Issue | Breaking Change | Exploit Maturity :-------------------------:|-------------------------|:-------------------------|:-------------------------|:------------------------- ![medium severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/m.png "medium severity") | **551/1000**
